mapper.select: SELECT id,name FROM categories WHERE level = #{level} ORDER BY name
SELECT id,name,level FROM categories WHERE id IN ( SELECT ancestor_id FROM category_tree_paths WHERE descendant_id = #{descendantId} ) ORDER BY level

SELECT id,name,level FROM categories WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM category_tree_paths WHERE categories.id = category_tree_paths.descendant_id AND ancestor_id = #{id} ) AND level = ( SELECT level + 1 FROM categories WHERE id = #{id} )
SELECT level FROM categories WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM categories WHERE level >= ${@com.example.common.CategoryLevel@GRAND_CHILD.level} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM category_tree_paths WHERE categories.id = category_tree_paths.descendant_id AND ancestor_id = #{id} ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO categories (name,description,level,registered_date_time,registered_name,updated_date_time,updated_name) VALUES (#{category.name},#{category.description},#{category.level},now(),'登録者ユーザーID',now(),'登録者ユーザーID')
